name: aeboilerplate
description: AEboilerplate is an opinionated boilerplate that creates a full-stack React/Node Typescript project, with independent client and API structures in the same repository, ready to run and deploy with a neat and tidy base.

scripts.aeboilerplate: npm i && rimraf .git && npm run api-npm-i && npm run stop-containers && npm run generator && rimraf generator
scripts.generator: cd generator && npm i && npm run create && cd ../client && prettier --write */*.tsx --loglevel silent
scripts.build-client: npm i --prefix client --only=dev && npm i --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.stop-all-containers: docker stop $(docker ps -q) || true && docker rm $(docker ps -aq) || true
scripts.\n# General commands: After executing the `npm run aeboilerplate` command, run `npm build && npm start` to use the built version
scripts.install-dependencies: npm i && npm run client-npm-i && npm run api-npm-i && npm run stop-containers
scripts.build: npm i && npm run build-client && npm run build-api
